html.p: Select the Application Name from the dropdown

table.title: Bad Application
table.searchTemplate: eventtype="mssharepoint-iis" sc_status="404" OR "500"|table s_ip,cs_uri_stem,sc_status|rename s_ip as "IP Address",cs_uri_stem as URL,sc_status as "Status Code"

table.title: Most Popular Lists
table.searchTemplate: sourcetype="SharepointAuditLogger" ItemType=List ApplicationName=$ApplicationName$ | top ListName by ApplicationName

table.title: Large List Usage
table.searchTemplate: sourcetype="SharepointAuditLogger" ApplicationName=$ApplicationName$ NOT ItemName=""|eval ItemSizeKB=round(ItemSize/1024)|eval SiteQuota=round(((ItemSizeKB/(StorageMaximumLevelMB*1024))*100),2)|stats dc(ItemName) by ApplicationName,ItemName,ItemSizeKB,SiteQuota,UserName|fields - dc(ItemName) |rename SiteQuota as "Site Quota %"| sort -ItemSizeKB
